input_str:
[BEGIN] Hey gang! I am currently writing my key-note address for the National Coming Out Day Brunch sponsored by The Utah Pride Center. They have kindly asked me to come speak about my post, Dear Hypothetically Gay Son. So, on Sunday at 11 I' ll be coming out in support of my LGBT friends and family! No matter where you are, I hope you'll join me in doing the same. I'll post a full version of what I say sometime next week. In the meantime, here is a post from my awesome wife about a cute habit The Duchess has formed.





Love, Dad

I (Mom) clean The Duchess's room every day. Sometimes she helps, sometimes I do it when she's not home. But this is generally the way it looks when it's clean:









Now let's fast-forward approximately 2.5 hours, after she wakes up
